snippet: NBC Universal on Saturday begins the first season of its three-year, $250 million deal to carry games from England’s Premier League.
abstract: NBC Universal is poised to begin the first season of its three-year, $250 million deal to broadcast soccer games from England’s Premier League, which will show every match either on television or on digital streams.
lead_paragraph: NBC Universal on Saturday begins the first season of its three-year, $250 million deal to carry games from England’s Premier League.

headline.main: NBC Is Set to Showcase Elite Soccer
headline.print_headline: NBC Is Set To Showcase Elite Soccer
